Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by California in 1986...
Injured on 8/3/1989 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1990, off Manny Sarmiento (DET)...

Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 4/1/1993...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Texas on 5/2/1994...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 4/20/1995...
Injured on 8/15/1995 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
